content: the clean simple lines + cozy thickness of the waffle stitch have my heart these mittens are soft stretchy and can be made in a variety of sizes colour blocked or solid these mittens are a winner either way pictured with the watson hat pattern in shop the mittens also match the watson socks pattern in shop and watson cardigan pattern also in shop please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in the future sizes baby 6-12 months - 5 circumference 4 length toddler 1-3 years - 5 5 circumference 5 length kids 3-10 years - 7 circumference 6 length adult small - 7 5 circumference 7 length adult medium - 8 circumference 7 length adult large - 8 5 circumference 7 5 length in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes written pattern in english us terms pictures video tutorial left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
